00035 namespace _internal
00036 {
00038 template<typename TYPE> struct __cast_to {
00039     template<typename SOURCE> TYPE operator()( Type<TYPE> *dest, const SOURCE &value ) {
00040         return boost::lexical_cast<TYPE>( value ); //generic version types are different - so do lexical cast
00041     }
00042     TYPE operator()( Type<TYPE> *dest, const TYPE &value ) {
00043         return value; //special version types are same - so just return the value
00044     }
00045 };
00046 template<> struct __cast_to<uint8_t> { // we cannot lexical_cast to uint8_t - we'll get "characters" (1 => '1' == 49)
00047     template<typename SOURCE> uint8_t operator()( Type<uint8_t> *dest, const SOURCE &value ) {
00048         // have to check by hand because the lexical cast will only check against unsigned short
00049         if( value > std::numeric_limits<uint8_t>::max() ) {
00050             throw boost::bad_lexical_cast( typeid( SOURCE ), typeid( uint8_t ) );
00051         }
00052 
00053         // lexical cast to unsigned short and then static_cast to uint8_t
00054         return static_cast<uint8_t>( boost::lexical_cast<unsigned short>( value ) );
00055     }
00056     uint8_t operator()( Type<uint8_t> *dest, const uint8_t &value ) {
00057         return value; //special version types are same - so just return the value
00058     }
00059 };
00061 
00062 class TypeBase : public GenericType
00063 {
00064     static const TypeConverterMap &converters();
00065     friend class TypeReference<TypeBase>;
00066 protected:
00073     virtual TypeBase *clone()const = 0;
00074 public:
00075     typedef TypeReference<TypeBase> Reference;
00076     typedef TypeConverterMap::mapped_type::mapped_type Converter;
00077 
00078     template<typename T> bool is()const;
00079 
00080     const Converter &getConverterTo( unsigned short id )const;
00081 
00090     static bool convert( const TypeBase &from, TypeBase &to );
00091 
00106     template<class T> T as()const {
00107         if( is<T>() )
00108             return cast_to<T>();
00109 
00110         Reference ret = copyToNewById( Type<T>::staticID );
00111 
00112         if ( ret.empty() ) {
00113             LOG( Debug, error )
00114                     << "Interpretation of " << toString( true ) << " as " << Type<T>::staticName()
00115                     << " failed. Returning " << Type<T>().toString() << ".";
00116             return T();
00117         } else
00118             return ret->cast_to<T>();
00119     }
00120 
00127     template<typename T> const Type<T>& cast_to_Type() const;
00128     template<typename T> const T &cast_to() const;
00129 
00136     template<typename T> Type<T>& cast_to_Type();
00137     template<typename T> T &cast_to();
00138     virtual bool operator==( const TypeBase &second )const = 0;
00139 
00141     Reference copyToNewById( unsigned short id ) const;
00142 
00147     bool fitsInto( unsigned short id ) const;
00148 
00149     virtual ~TypeBase();
00150 
00151     virtual bool gt( const _internal::TypeBase &ref )const = 0;
00152     virtual bool lt( const _internal::TypeBase &ref )const = 0;
00153     virtual bool eq( const _internal::TypeBase &ref )const = 0;
00154 };
